problem_text_cn: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,∠BAD=130°,∠B=∠D=90°,点E,F分别是线段BC,DC上的动点．当△AEF的周长最小时,则∠EAF的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, ∠BAD = N_0, ∠B = ∠D = N_1, points E and F are the moving points on the line segments BC and DC, respectively. When the perimeter of △AEF is the smallest, then the degree of ∠EAF is ()
raw_answer: 解:作A关于BC和CD的对称点A′,A″,连接A′A″,交BC于E,交CD于F,则A′A″即为△AEF的周长最小值．作DA延长线AH,∵∠DAB=130°,∴∠HAA′=50°,∴∠AA′E+∠A″=∠HAA′=50°,∵∠EA′A=∠EAA′,∠FAD=∠A″,∴∠EAA′+∠A″AF=50°,∴∠EAF=130°-50°=80°,故选:B．
